mapper.insert: INSERT INTO wishlist (user_id, car_id, create_date, update_date) VALUES (#{user_id}, #{car_id}, NOW(), NOW());
mapper.select: SELECT w.id, w.user_id, w.car_id, c.brand, c.model, c.price, c.horsepower, c.max_speed, c.image_url, w.create_date, w.update_date FROM wishlist w JOIN car c ON w.car_id = c.id WHERE w.user_id = #{user_id};
SELECT w.id, w.user_id, w.car_id, c.brand, c.model, c.price, c.horsepower, c.max_speed, c.image_url, w.create_date, w.update_date FROM wishlist w JOIN car c ON w.car_id = c.id;
